name: Aimless fall
description:
A short 21 floor, procedurally generated rouge-like game, made under the guidance of Krystman from lazydevs, music made by Sebastian Haßler (@sebashas), Mob's pixel art made by 鬼雷 昇炎 (@kirai_s).

Good luck trying to beat this very challenging game. It took a few weeks to complete, but I would love it if you gave it a try.

See how many item names there are (spoilers, there are too many), see the personality or trait of the mob that killed you, or simply eat thousands of different dishes, some of them are just like mom use to make.
